Posts.EditableText:
I have been unable to upload .aslx files to the Quest Wiki recently, getting:

[i:29ovdrei]This file contains HTML or script code that may be erroneously interpreted by a web browser.[/i:29ovdrei]

Is this due to a new security update? Is there a way around it? I was hoping to upload a library file, then add a Wiki page on how to use it. Not much point if the library cannot be uploaded.

Posts.EditableText:
I don't know, do we have any existing .aslx files on there?

Anyway the wiki is supposed to be for documentation, so would it make more sense just to paste the code into a page?
